# Frame Codex Weavers
#
# This file lists trusted contributors ("Weavers") who have demonstrated
# consistent high-quality contributions to the Frame Codex. PRs opened by
# users in this list will be automatically approved and merged after passing
# all validation checks.
#
# Format: One GitHub username per line (no @ symbol)
# Comments start with #
#
# To become a Weaver:
# 1. Submit 5+ high-quality PRs that pass all validation
# 2. Demonstrate understanding of the Codex schema and quality standards
# 3. Receive nomination from existing Weavers or maintainers
#
# Maintainers (full access):
jddunn
